newsitem.title: USA: Micro Focus names Waters president, ceo.
newsitem.headline: Micro Focus names Waters president, ceo.

text.p: Micro Focus Group Plc named Martin Waters as president and chief executive officer, following the resignation of Marcelo Gumucio.

Gumucio, CEO since April 1996, was responsible for improving operations and increasing profitability for the company. He will return to Gumucio, Burke and Associates, a family-owned investment firm, and will also continue with Micro Focus in a consulting capacity.

Waters brings to Micro Focus over 20 years experience in managing information technology operations. Previously he was President and chief executive of Platinum Solutions Inc, a unit of Platinum Technology Inc.
